title: cmd/compile: stupid shift if right shift
body:
Gc rejects to compile the following program:
```go
package a
var v = 0>>1000
```
saying:
```
stupid shift: 1000
```
gotype compiles it successfully.
Compilers should agree on whether it is a valid Go program or not.

on commit af817890aa7b628234075a6cb01a3a435fb8317d
